routeDiversion.title: Route 8 Temporary Diversion - Construction Work

serviceRestored.title: Route 12 Service Restored

terminalUpgrade.title: Downtown Terminal Upgrade
terminalUpgrade.details: Platform 3 and 4 will be closed for modernization work from 10 PM to 5 AM. Routes 10, 11, and 12 will temporarily use Platform 1 and 2.

busStopImprovements.title: Route 25 Bus Stop Improvements
busStopImprovements.details: Installation of new digital displays and shelters at 5 major stops along Route 25. Temporary bus stop relocations will be marked.

fleetMaintenance.title: Fleet Maintenance Weekend
fleetMaintenance.details: Reduced frequency on Routes 30-35 during scheduled fleet maintenance. Buses will run every 30 minutes instead of 15 minutes.
